name: Glimbatt
printed_effect:
When an opponent activates a card effect that
discards a card from your hand you can discard
this Glimbatt in order to Negate that effect and
destroy that card. You can Disenchant {solar} from
this Glimbatt in order to draw 2 cards.
effect: When an opponent activates a card effect that discards a card from your hand you can discard this Glimbatt in order to Negate that effect and destroy that card. You can Disenchant {solar} from this Glimbatt in order to draw 2 cards.
